org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Class EntityQueryDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.LazyQueryDefinition
      • org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.EntityQueryDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, QueryDefinition

    public class EntityQueryDefinition
extends LazyQueryDefinition
    Defines entity query definition to be used with JPA entity managers.
    Author:
    Tommi Laukkanen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityQueryDefinition

        public EntityQueryDefinition(boolean applicationManagedTransactions,
                     boolean detachedEntities,
                     boolean compositeItems,
                     Class<?> entityClass,
                     int batchSize,
                     Object idPropertyId)
        Constructor for configuring query definition.
        Parameters:
        applicationManagedTransactions - True if application manages transactions instead of container.
        detachedEntities - True of entities are detached from PersistenceContext.
        compositeItems - True f items are wrapped to CompositeItems.
        entityClass - The entity class.
        batchSize - The batch size.
        idPropertyId - The ID of the ID property or null if item index is used as ID.
